minetest.download.software.link.descript: To get started, download the Minetest software via this link :
minetest.info.download.software.link: Download Minetest software from this link :
minetest.invitation.cc.label: Recipient :
minetest.invitation.default.body.1:
Hello,

You are invited to participate in building a Minetest world. Please follow these steps:

How to download the Minetest software ?

If you have already used Minetest on this computer, you can skip to the next part: How do I join a world I have been invited to ?
  1. Click on this link and the zip archive of the Minetest software will be downloaded to your computer
  2. Go to your file explorer > Downloads and find the archive you just downloaded which has the name 'minetest-5.5.0-win64'
  3. Right click and select 'Extract all'
  4. Choose the folder location by clicking 'Browse... ' and by selecting for example 'Desktop' so that the folder containing the Minetest software is found on the desktop of your computer. You can validate by clicking on 'Select a folder' then 'Extract'
  5. Wait until the download is complete'
  6. Once finished, continue to the next step

How to open Minetest?
  1. Go to your desktop, open the folder named 'minetest-5.5.0-win64'
  2. Enter the following folders: 'minetest-5.5.0- win64' > 'bin' then you will find a 'minetest' file illustrated by the logo of the application, open it
  3. A new window has opened: you access Minetest
  4. Click on the 'Join a game' tab
  5. To join a world you have been invited to, continue to the next step.

How do I join a world I have been invited to ?

Enter the world information in the various boxes provided
